document.full_text: don't expect long lines to see "the lincoln lawyer" -- a big portion of the audience for the lionsgate film has already purchased their tickets online and got a hefty discount for doing so.
document.title: groupon's "lincoln lawyer" ticket offer is popular
lines_and_colors: don't expect long lines to see "the lincoln lawyer" -- a big portion of the audience for the lionsgate film has already purchased their tickets online and got a hefty discount for doing so.
